sentences.en: ...a reference from the Koran.
sentences.cn: …一段《可兰经》的引文。

sentences.en: a comprehensive list of references
sentences.cn: 详尽的参考书目清单

sentences.en: a list of towns, each with a map reference
sentences.cn: 一份城镇清单，每个城镇都有地图参照号

sentences.en: He made no reference to any agreement.
sentences.cn: 他没有提到任何协议。

sentences.en: He summed up his philosophy, with reference to Calvin.
sentences.cn: 他总结了自己的哲学，还提及了加尔文。

sentences.en: I am writing with reference to your article on salaries for scientists.
sentences.cn: 我写此信是为了回应你那篇探讨科学家薪水的文章。

sentences.en: I like to have my reference books within my reach.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢把参考书放到伸手可取的地方.

sentences.en: I'm calling in reference to your series on prejudice.
sentences.cn: 我打电话是要谈谈你写的有关“偏见”的系列文章。

sentences.en: It was an oblique reference to his mother.
sentences.cn: 这影射到了他的母亲。

sentences.en: Keep their price list on file for future reference (= so that it can be looked at in the future ) .
sentences.cn: 将他们的价目表存档，以供日后参考。

sentences.en: Keep their price list on file for future reference (= so that it can be looked at in the future ) ..
sentences.cn: 将他们的价目表存档，以供日后参考。

sentences.en: Keep their price list on file for future reference (= so that it can be looked at in the future ).
sentences.cn: 将他们的价目表存档，以供日后参考。

sentences.en: Make a note of the reference number shown on the form.
sentences.cn: 把表格上的编码记下来。

sentences.en: Our charges are calculated by reference to an hourly rate.
sentences.cn: 我们收费是按每小时的固定费用计算的.

sentences.en: Please quote this reference number when reordering stock.
sentences.cn: 再次订货时请提供这个编号。

sentences.en: Read these notes carefully and keep them for future reference.
sentences.cn: 仔细阅读这些注释并将其保留下来以备将来之用。

sentences.en: she lodged this idea in the back of her mind for future reference.
sentences.cn: 她把这个想法记在心里供日后参考。

sentences.en: The booklet is very practical and handy of reference.
sentences.cn: 这本小册子很实用,而且便于查考.

sentences.en: The details are filed away by his three secretaries for future reference.
sentences.cn: 他的3个秘书已经把详细情况归档备查。

sentences.en: The library contains a large number of foreign language reference books.
sentences.cn: 图书馆有大量的外文参考书.

sentences.en: The matter, they decided, lay outside the commission's terms of reference.
sentences.cn: 他们认定这个问题不在委员会受托权限之内。

sentences.en: the minister will present a plan outlining the inquiry's terms of reference.
sentences.cn: 大臣将提出一份概述调查委托范围的计划。

sentences.en: The official at the American embassy asked me for two references.
sentences.cn: 美国大使馆的官员要我提供两名证明人。

sentences.en: There is no direct reference to her own childhood in the novel.
sentences.cn: 小说里没有直接提及她自己的童年。

sentences.en: war can only be explained with reference to complex social factors.
sentences.cn: 战争只能用复杂的社会因素来解释。

sentences.en: We know we're dealing with someone with a different frame of reference.
sentences.cn: 我们知道和我们打交道的人持有不同的观念。

sentences.en: We spent days going through all related reference material.
sentences.cn: 我们花了好多天功夫查阅所有有关的参考资料.

words.tran_cn: 可归因于…；可参考的；可交付的；可涉及的
参照；提及；被推举的人；转诊病人
引用（reference的过去分词）；附…以供参考
涉及；委托；归诸于；使…求助于

phrases.tran_cn: 资料室；参考资料室；参考书阅览室

trans.tran_cn: 提及，查询，征求，引语，编号，参考书目，推荐信，介绍人
trans.tran_en: part of something you say or write in which you mention a person or thing
